Title: Fairy Tail: Priestess of the Phoenix
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy
Writer: Hiro Mashima (manga), Masashi Sogo (screenplay), John Burgmeier (head writer), Monica Rial (script writer), Tyler Walker (script writer)
Actors: Aya Endô, Aya Hirano, Tetsuya Kakihara, Hiroki Touchi
Plot: The mightiest team of mages from the magic kingdom's most infamous guild faces evil rising from the embers in this action-packed feature length adventure. Follow Fairy Tail's dream ...
